sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RICCIA in botany : A genus of the natural order of algæ, belonging to the cryptogamia claſs of plants. There is no calyx, but a veſicular cavity within the ſub-ſtance of the leaf. There is no corolla ; the antheræ are cylindrical, and ſeſſile, placed on the germen, which is turbinated ; the ſtyle is filiform, perforating the an-
thera ; and the ſeed-caſe is ſpherical, crowned with the withered anthera ; the ſeeds are hemiſpherical and pedi-cellatcd.
